name: 2nd Global Summit on Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology
content: Dear Colleagues, It is a great pleasure to announce that The Scientistt will host the 2nd Global Summit on Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology (GSCCET2022) will be held November 14-16, 2022 in Chicago, USA. GSCCET2022 aims to bring together the renowned researchers, scientists and scholars to exchange ideas, to present sophisticated research works and to discuss hot topics in the field and share their experiences on all aspects of Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology. The GSCCET2022 will be a 3 days event that means to gather the key players of the Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology community and related sectors. This event is launched with the aims to become an established event, attracting global participants, intent on sharing, exchanging and exploring new avenues of Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology -related scientific and commercial developments. A wide-ranging scientific program consisting of plenary lectures, keynote lectures, Invited lectures, parallel sessions, as well as poster sessions for young scientists covering all topics in Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology will be scheduled. This conference provides a wonderful opportunity for you to enhance your knowledge about the newest interdisciplinary approaches in Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology. Moreover, the conference offers a valuable platform to create new contacts in the field of Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology, by providing valuable networking time for you to meet great personnel in the field. We look forward to seeing you at GSCCET2022 in Chicago, USA.
